      • input_numerator

        public static void input_numerator(int number)
        Function for numerator and denominator input
        Parameters:
        number - Operand number
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If one of the arguments went beyond 1000000
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - If any of the denominators is 0 or number is less than 0
        java.lang.Exception - If input number is not of the int type and all other situations
